<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>State Changes based on the Actuals</description>
        <name>PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler = Class.create();
PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler.prototype = {
    initialize: function(plannedTaskGr) {
        this.plannedTaskGr = plannedTaskGr;
        var ptStateUtil = new PlannedTaskStateUtil(this.plannedTaskGr);
		this.isStateInactive = ptStateUtil.isStateInactive(this.plannedTaskGr.state);
		this.isStateWIP = ptStateUtil.isStateWIP(this.plannedTaskGr.state);
		this.isStateOpenOrPending = ptStateUtil.isStateOpen(this.plannedTaskGr.state) || ptStateUtil.isStatePending(this.plannedTaskGr.state);
        this.defaultPendingState = ptStateUtil.getDefaultPendingState();
        this.defaultWIPState = ptStateUtil.getDefaultWorkState();
        this.defaultCloseState = ptStateUtil.getDefaultCloseState();
    },

    processActualDateChanges: function () {
        PPMDebug.log("Into PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler.processActualDateChanges -> " + this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("sys_id")
            + " | Work Start: " + this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("work_start") + " | Work End: " + this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("work_end"));
        if(JSUtil.notNil(this.plannedTaskGr)) {
			//Set state based on actual date
			if (JSUtil.notNil(this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("work_end")) && !this.isStateInactive)
				this.plannedTaskGr.setValue("state", this.defaultCloseState);
			else if (JSUtil.notNil(this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("work_start")) && JSUtil.nil(this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("work_end")) && !this.isStateWIP)
				this.plannedTaskGr.setValue("state", this.defaultWIPState);
			else if (JSUtil.nil(this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("work_start")) && JSUtil.nil(this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("work_end")) && !this.isStateOpenOrPending)
				this.plannedTaskGr.setValue("state", this.defaultPendingState);
        }  
        PPMDebug.log("Into PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler.processActualDateChanges: State-> " + this.plannedTaskGr.getValue("state"));
    },	

    type: 'PlannedTaskStateChangeOnActualsHandler'
};]]></script>
